title: Looking for people to play with?
body:
Join my discord community :3 So far we have bronze-plat  member and plan on adding more. Everyone is organized by the role they main along with an elo tag. In the future we plan to make teams and have scrims, and even do RP prizes. When you come to the server, just message the owner with role/elo and come join us!

https://discord.gg/011amLs7jFplbor5b

If you don't know how discord works, you can download the app or paste this link into your browser and it works the same way.

Thanks! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
